alert.note: Alert for Escambia; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 5:48PM EDT until August 05 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... West central Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 447 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Molino, or 7 miles north of Gonzalez, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gonzalez, Pace, and Molino. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
